dialogue: ğŸŒğŸ¯…ğŸ¡¢ğŸ¯†ğŸ¡¢ğŸ¯‡ğŸ¡¢ğŸ•§
â­¬ğŸ®²ğŸ®³â­ª  ğŸ™¶ğŸ‚ğŸ¢±ğŸ™·  â­¬â¬—â­ª
ğŸ‘ªâ›‡ğŸ¡¢ğŸƒ´ğŸ‘‚ğŸ¡¢ğŸ’³ğŸ¡¢ğŸ‘ŒğŸ•ğŸª‚ğŸ—£
8ğŸ—ƒâ‡¨ğŸ®•ğŸ«ğŸ«€ğŸ®•â‡¨ğŸ¯ğŸ¯‚ğŸ¯ƒğŸ¯†âŸğŸ–§â‡¨â‡¨â‡¨â¦ğŸ—šğŸ—šğŸ—±

ğŸ—¦ğŸª§ğŸ‘ğŸ”âœ©âœ”â™¡âœ“âœŒğŸ–³âœ°âœ®ğŸ–…âœ­â™¥âœ©ğŸ–’â™¡ğ‡µâ¹â¸â·ğŸ«€âœŒâœ”ğŸ–’ğŸ•¸â™¥ğŸ—¢âœ©âœ”ğŸ•¯ğŸª¦ğŸŒ£ğŸ—§
angry: â˜

name: Badabing
dialogue: Wow! Tune in next time to find out what I have in store :)

Thanks for tuning in! WOW, you're looking good! I was just down at the casino and I wasn't doing too hot at the oleâ€™ poker table, those gamblinâ€™ rats were onto my tricks bigtimeâ€¦ but I'm used to losing games, I've always had bad luck, ever since the curse

Do you like my cape? My mom made it for me. I've always wanted to be a hero and my mom knows that better than anyone because sheâ€™s MY hero. Every time I put this cape on I try to do at least two good deeds for every bad one

I heard about this show from my cousin, Boy-Boy-Mysterio. They found love and I said well! If you find it, I'm gonna go find it! Not sure exactly what it looks like or where it is, but after my jazzercise class I called and asked my grandma. I took some notes (they are in my diary)

I'm so DE-lighted to get to know you, and I can't wait for you to get to know my bugs. I keep them in my home but they all have very spacious enclosures and are well fed and I talk to them about my problems. My favorite is Bartholemew the house centipede, we always chat in the mornings while I polish my nose.

I love a loose sock, even If they make me trip. I love you, even though sometimes I trip because Iâ€™m distracted by your presence and these feelings... of loveâ€¦ which Iâ€™d never felt before. But next to my love for you, I think I might not even like socks. My fortune teller told me that Iâ€™d have to find my true love to reverse my bad luck. Now I realize how lucky I am
angry: I am SAD... I'm going to leave the show! There are better things to do with my time! BadaBYE!

name: Boingo
tagline: Iâ€™m awake, letâ€™s do something fun!
dialogue: Hey, pleased to make your acquaintance! Gosh, Iâ€™m so pumped up, being on this show, meeting new people, YEAHHH â€“ I just wanna do a backflip! But I wonâ€™t because my gymnastics instructor says Iâ€™m not ready, even though Iâ€™ve been training for almost a week

Wow, I feel GREAT today. Itâ€™s like every time I wake up, Iâ€™m feeling better and better! Ask me about my UberRatte sleep schedule sometime and Iâ€™ll tell you my secret haha! Anyway, I went skiing last week for the first time and the instructor said theyâ€™d never seen someone use two pairs of skis at once before!

Iâ€™m a huuuge fan of cows. The way they just relax and eat grass and go about their lives... Whoowee! I could dream about them alllll day! Before I take a nap I try to find a nearby cow to sleep next so they can enter into my dreams. You know the movie Inception? Itâ€™s kinda like that, but reversed

Okay, are you ready? Iâ€™m about to tell you the secret to my passion for life: the UberRatte sleep schedule! I sleep in 3.5 hour increments and wake up and do my tasks in 30 minute increments and then I go back to sleep! That means Iâ€™m only awake for 3 hours a day but WOW am I ever well-rested and thrilled to be here

If I ever fell asleep near you and you entered my dreams, there would be two of you in there. What Iâ€™m trying to say is that youâ€™re ALREADY the rat of my dreams. What Iâ€™m trying to say is I love you!!!

I love you so much!!! Youâ€™re the coolest, and I know youâ€™ll help me achieve my goals. I canâ€™t wait to help you achieve your goals too. My timer just went off so Iâ€™ll have to go to sleep in a minute, but as soon as Iâ€™m awake again letâ€™s go swimming!!!
angry: booooooo! I'm leaving! bye!

name: Boogaloo
dialogue: Honk! What did you think of that honk? It was great, wasnâ€™t it? Iâ€™ve mastered the art of honking. Honking is funny because of the spherical shape of the nose attachment and the subsequent soundâ€™s perfect frequency of exactly 152 Hertz â€” oh sorry, Iâ€™m rambling again. All I can say is that Iâ€™m at the top of my class in a top-tier clown school.

Whatâ€™s your life plan? Iâ€™ve mapped mine out carefully, down to each day. Years 1-3: Clownegie Melon University. Year 4, I graduate early and do a post-doc in a famous show group in Australia. Year 5, I get married. Year 6, you â€” oh whoops, I shouldnâ€™t have said that â€” I mean, whoever my future partner isâ€” and I have 3 baby rats and then we have a perfect family of 5 clowns.

I know clowning has an inconsistent income stream, but Iâ€™m very good at low-stakes gambling and fill in the gaps that way. I have a good memory and read books on blackjack in my spare time. Itâ€™s one of my goals to be an upstanding citizen, but more than that I want to be honorable in your eyes. I can make sure that we live comfortably and I can make you laugh every day.

I think the reason Iâ€™m so good at clowning isnâ€™t natural talent, but rather, Iâ€™ve mastered the /science/ of clowning. I studied really hard and persevered. I also have a great persona that Iâ€™ve user tested extensively. Itâ€™s been my dream since I was little to make people happy, but I wasnâ€™t naturally funny. So I studied and studied.
I love juggling. But Itâ€™s important to me that you know I only juggle props, and I would /never/ juggle your heart. I love juggling but I love you even more.
Honk! H-honk! Oh sorry Iâ€™m crying from joy a little and itâ€™s making my nose honk! But Iâ€™m so happy! I canâ€™t believe it! Iâ€™m going to make you the happiest rat alive!
angry: That wasn't funny at all! This show is a circus, and not the good kind. I'm leaving!

name: Corge
tagline: Why hello there, care to get to know eachother better?
dialogue: If thereâ€™s one thing u oughta know about me its that im a sitter. I dont stand for anything, unless it compels me. I also keep my arms crossed, unless I am thusly moved by something profound

Iâ€™ll always remember the time my Pa took me aside and he said â€œCorge, youâ€™ve gotta have a little courageâ€, and Diggity-doggone if that isn't more true than anything else. So now I have it, kinda helped me unlock my inner psyche, and it helps keep me young. Thatâ€™s why the glow of youth and confidence are inherent in my energy

The hustle and bustle of city life is a bit new to me, but I think itâ€™s nice, and I like spending time with you here. It provides lots of opportunity for adventure - why, just this morning I met some new rats at the Saloon who i think will serve to be lifelong friends. I never meet new rats when Iâ€™m at home, since Iâ€™m the only one who lives there

Actually the first time I met you, I said â€œwow! Now thereâ€™s a rat!â€ and I was right, you really are a rat! One of a kind. Iâ€™m glad we met; I know it hasnâ€™t been that long but I feel weâ€™re getting to know each other. Would you mind if I gave you my address so we can write to each other?
You are my dearest friend, my friendliest dearâ€¦ and I think, that my affections are blossoming into.. love?

My dearest dearest dear. Our love will be of the happy steadfast unwavering sort. Iâ€™m incredibly charmed and delighted, excited! I am simply over the moon! Just like the cow in â€˜Hey Diddle Diddle'! I am so happy to embark on this journey of love with you
angry: those are the words of a stander... you're not a sitter like me. I don't like you, and I am going to leave this show.

name: Emmory
tagline: Let me play you a tune!
dialogue: Oh, hi! I love the melody of your voice, and Iâ€™m really excited to get to know you more. Your laugh makes me smile, and not just because it reminds me of a happy song Iâ€™ve been wanting to write!

I just had the best muffin from my siblings bakery, their shop is on the way to the symphony so I stop there every day. Itâ€™s so fun to watch my siblings follow their passions! One time my older sibling tried out a new type of muffin, Orange Pecan flavored. They werenâ€™t sure it would be good but it was so delicious and now itâ€™s my favorite thing on the menu!

One time the orchestra played my favorite Mozrat piece. My heart almost burst, I couldnâ€™t believe how magical it was hearing all of those instruments working together to create such brilliant sounds. Thanks for listening to me talk about things I love!

Hey, I wrote you a song! Itâ€™s inspired by the resonant frequencies of your laughter. Iâ€™ve been practicing on my snout flute (snute) which has a special timbre. Itâ€™s something I do for special people who mean a lot to me (like you)!

Iâ€™ve honestly felt really different since I met you, much lighter and more creative! We could start a band, or a crafting club, or anything reallyâ€¦ I love you, and I want to keep exploring this beautiful world with you! Letâ€™s film a music video for the song of joy that my heart plays when you are near!

Oh my love, you chose me, you really did! My heart is fluttering like the delicate melody of the piano keys in a glorious concerto. Letâ€™s build each other up, and never stop dreaming! I canâ€™t wait to live my life with you!
angry: Oh my, that's a bit mean. I don't think this is going to work out, so I'm going to take an early exit from the show! Hope that's okay!

name: Flyboi
dialogue: Last night, I woke up and I was ready to start the day! But then I realized it was 4am and Iâ€™d woken up early! An accident, but what an opportunity! I immediately ran outside and practiced flapping my arms - Iâ€™ve been growing out my hairs so they act more like wings, and I think itâ€™s almost working!

When I woke up as a baby, I thought to myself, wow! Iâ€™d really like to push the boundaries of what it means to be a rat. Can I be a bird? Can I be a plane? A hang glider? Whatever happened to the Hindenburg? Let me learn to fly and then I will know

I got so excited to see you today that I accidentally woke up early! again! I woke up at the perfect time though, because the early bird was in my yard! I said hello and asked about how they learned to fly so well. I thought birds knew how to fly as soon as they hatched, but apparently they donâ€™t - they have an instinct and then they practice until they can do it. Just like me!

When I wake up and face my morning routine, one of the first things i do is stretttch!!!! Hands in the air! I stretch them up and down to lengthen them, which helps to not impede the flying process, and makes me more aerodynamic!!!
When I woke up today, I was so excited to see you. Though I was on the ground, my heart was soaring! And when I spoke to my heart, it said â€˜hello!â€™, and it also said that it loves you.

I canâ€™t wait to fly through life with you! We can honeymoon in the most aerodynamic of locations, and we can hang glide, and even tour the runways and the international airport! There is no one I would rather embark on this adventure with. Oh Iâ€™m so excited! Letâ€™s start planning right now!!
angry: Your mean-spirited words have grounded me. I'm going to leave.

name: Frozine
dialogue: Iâ€™m a critically acclaimed ice-cream toppings coordinator. I studied abroad on full scholarship in my ratdolesence. I studied amongst the finest in my field and truly got in touch with my personal, professional, and artistic motivations

When I was abroad, my ice cream artistry class had a large focus on a strong conceptual backing, rather than just focusing on creating a technically perfect cone. With this, the nuance of choice entered my mind - a focus on the why not the how.

I graduated at the top of my class with honors of the highest caliber. More important to me than my academic standing was my self fulfilment in certifiably having mastered my craft. However, my pursuit is lifelong and I know I will continue to learn and perfect /past/ mastery.

One of my favorite moments was drizzling chocolate ganache on a pistachio-pastiche waffle cone, and presenting it to an undercover michelin star reviewer. As soon as they took the first bite, they thanked me and everyone started clapping. I was so overcome I started to openly weep.

As a savant in my field, and a former child prodigy, I have had the comfort of a deeply felt connection to my practice. My identity is enriched by it, and in return my craft is only deepened and nourished by my sense of self. I think that when we dedicate our time and our earnesty towards something that we care about, we are made better by and because of it. I am dedicated to you, and I love you so much

Let me bake us a wedding cake - Iâ€™m the only one I trust to make a cake to the required perfection. And you are the only one I trust to eat it. With your good taste and my expert craftsmanship I think we can do anything we want, and I want to spend the rest of my long and promising life by your side.
angry: No ice cream for mean rats! Ever! I'm LEAVING.

name: Hammerton
dialogue: Yawnâ€¦ was there something interesting you wanted to say?

Why is it so loud in here? Do they have to play music? Iâ€™m trying to take a napâ€¦ They have no considerations for the wants and needs of a modern day Machiavelli. Iâ€™m smart and sophisticated, but at the end of the day I need sleep like everyone else

Just being honest, the rat of my dreams was in my dreams last night. They said something but I couldnâ€™t understand what they were talking about. Talking talking talking. Exhausting. Iâ€™m glad our time together is mostly quiet.

I had a dream about you during my nap, and it made me realize that I should at least try to get to know youâ€¦ Do you like cheese? I brought some, but itâ€™s my favorite most expensive cheese and honestly well I just donâ€™t know you that wellâ€¦ Iâ€™m willing to consider buying a small cheddar from the closest shoppeâ€¦ Maybe.

Iâ€™m sorry Iâ€™m always frowning, itâ€™s just my general malaise. Even though youâ€™re a bit boring sometimes, youâ€™re surprisingly tolerable. In fact I think Iâ€¦ actually really enjoy spending time with you. What do you think?

Letâ€™s get out of this dump - I know a much nicer botanical garden over by an nicer and silenter waterfall, after all you know I love the quiet. It also doesnâ€™t have any of that potting mixture stuff, so we wonâ€™t have to worry about brushing dirt out of our fur. But I can brush your fur anyways if you want - I brought my boar-bristle hairbrush, imported from Italy.
angry: Ew.... yawn.... people like you bore me. I'm going home.

name: Manddy
dialogue: â€¦. Manddy
â€¦. This is Muffyâ€¦ my antâ€¦ theyâ€™re the biggest ant in the worldâ€¦

â€¦. 
â€¦. â€¦ I want Muffy to grow up believing in loveâ€¦ even if itâ€™s hard for meâ€¦ 
â€¦I know they need a role model, or they wonâ€™t know love when they find it for themselvesâ€¦

Muffy is 100x the size of a regular ant because Iâ€¦ only feed them miracle grow. Sometimes diet sodaâ€¦ after they get a bit bigger, I think.. Muffy will start developing a frontal lobe. Iâ€™ve got a philosophy textbook you could read to themâ€¦

My neighbor and I have been... working on digging a rat-sized ant-hill. â€¦ It started in our backyards then we connected and kept digging eastâ€¦ â€¦ maybe west? 
Muffy loves you (mainly your nostrils)â€¦ Letâ€™s go smell some dirt togetherâ€¦ there are notes of pine and mulch in the grass patch near my home that youâ€™ll love
â€¦â€¦.. Iâ€™m in love
angry: .... you make me sad. bye forever..

name: Marsh
dialogue:
Uwu :3 ! Iâ€™m Marsh, Itâ€™s so nice to meet you!! I want you to know I am really thrilled to be here! to meet you and for this opportunity! I actually have a scheduled live vlog I need to jump in on thatâ€™s happening in a second *Ringing noise*
Hewwo Marshins! Iâ€™m coming in live from The Ratchelor! Donâ€™t forget to like and subscribe, but first, check out this park! :3 Eeeeeeee!

Iâ€™m taking a short break from streaming today to focus on you, but letâ€™s take a pic to commemorate! The back camera 0.5 view fisheye effect is SO in right now, can I move closer to you for the selfie? Okay, here we go!! Oh, itâ€™s LOVELY! Iâ€™ll treasure it forever! Eeeee!

Time to film my daily livestream!! hey marshins :3 thanks for tuning in!!! Iâ€™m on a DATE!!! With a SUPER CUTE RAT omg SQUEeeâ€“ *static* Oh, what? Oh no. The wifi cut out. Ahhh okay problem solving time. I really gotttta fix this, sorry! I do like this location you picked! Tho! But Iâ€™m glad I can spend some time chatting with you while I try to fix it.

The wifi is still outâ€¦ sorry Iâ€™m just so sOOO stressed. Not feeling uwu at all. Usually Iâ€™m all :3 but now Im 3: *^* 
Itâ€™s just that the Marshins depend on my content. When I donâ€™t post they get really sad. The Marshins mean so much to me, I love them so much and I really want to make them happy. I also donâ€™t want them to worry since they donâ€™t know where I went, and I'm not sure which of them have developed object permanence, tho I'm sure they all miss me regardless!!

Oh, amazing, thank you!!! You are the best!! Thanks for fixing the wifi! 3, 2, 1â€¦ hey marshins!!! sorry about the delay! I have big news, Iâ€™m in LOVEâ€¦ SQUEE!!! and look, this is the RAT OF MY LITERAL DREAMS??? anyway let me know where we should get married in the comments!!!

omg!!! AHHHhh!!! I canâ€™t believe! you proposed! this is gonna be the best vlog ever!!! Our wedding! is gonna be ICONIC!! and! I canâ€™t wait! to show you to all the marshins!! and they are gonna just love you as much as I do !!!!!!

name: Michael
dialogue: Wow! I just have so many thoughts running through my head! Your eyes are so beautiful... Oh, you want to know about the two rats on my shoulder? Donâ€™t mind them, their names are Mich Mich and Aelâ€¦ Wow, your nose is so fortuitous. What? Oh yeah I came up with that compliment myself, my shoulder rats definitely didnâ€™t suggest itâ€¦ haha.

Thereâ€™s nothing more satisfying than sitting in a medium-light room while occasionally eating some bread, without butter, of course. But lately Mich Mich and Ael have been nagging me to get out more and to be more evil or more good. The thing is, I donâ€™t really like to think about whatâ€™s good or bad. I didnâ€™t even audition for this show or anything, but one day the producers called me up and told me to come here.

About a year ago, I was riding the bus, eating my all time favorite recipe of instant ramen in lukewarm water and without the seasoning packets. Then Mich Mich and Ael jumped out of nowhere. They said theyâ€™ve been â€œwaiting for someone like meâ€, that they were â€œwaiting for a real challengeâ€. Enough about that, tell me more about you. What are your thoughts on blended cheesecake and risk-taking?

I only have two friends, I guess youâ€™ve already met them and Iâ€™ve definitely talked about them (Mich Mich and Ael, the shoulder crew) - Iâ€™d like to think of them as my besties but I canâ€™t tell if they feel the same wayâ€¦ I think those two sometimes go get soup and donâ€™t send me an e-viteâ€¦ Do you think theyâ€™re hanging out without me? Maybe they donâ€™t invite me cause they know I donâ€™t like salt or gratuitous liquid in my foods...

I hope we can continue to talk like this and get to know each other better. You make my heart flutter in ways that Iâ€™ve never felt before â€” not even while reading the Terms of Services on websites â€” and itâ€™s making me want to act in ways I never have before!

Oh, I canâ€™t wait to spend the rest of my life with you! Mich Mich and Ael are so happy for us, they said they are fulfilled and can retire now! Letâ€™s life a comfortable and joyous life together, my love!
angry: Oh my... what is this feeling... is this sadness? Mich Mich is telling me I should lash out. I think instead of lashing out I'm just going to leave the show.

name: Mich Mich
dialogue: Now that its just you and me alone... I think we need to get some things straight. Am I evil? No. But... am I a force for evil? Yes. What does that mean for you and I? (âœ¿â—•â€¿â—•) hahaha! I'll let you decide

Think about it this way. If I accidently bring value to shareholders, then that means no one else will be able to experience the joy that that would have brought them (oÂ´â–½`oâœ¿). But.. what if I did it on purpose? It's still net negative. Sorta like... trickle down ethics... haha

Sometimes when I'm at the front row of the football games, I like to blow air gently in the players' direction. (âœ¿Ë˜Â³Ë˜)Â°ï½¡â‹†â™¡â€§â‚ŠËš I like to imagine (â—•á±›â—•âœ¿) that it makes the blades of grass rustle and that small action can cause a domino effect that changes the course of the entire game (â—•.Ì«â—•âœ¿). Is that fair? ha ha he he! I'll let you decide

Sometimes I give free haircuts but I purposefully leave two individual strands a half-centimeter longer. There must be a balance. hahaha! I like to drink oolong tea on the porch sometimes and tally up some scores. (oË˜â—¡Ë˜oâœ¿) Would you like to join me (â¦á´—â¦âœ¿) sometime? he he
hahahaha! he he he!!!!! (â—•_â—•âœ¿)  hahah! Why am I laughing so much, you ask? Well, I simply never imagined I'd find love (âœ¿Â¬â€¿Â¬)
hehehe! ha ha ha! (â—•á¥§â—•âœ¿) hahahahahaha. !  !  !!!!! hehe! heeeeheeeeeeheeeeeee hahaha !!!!!!! hhreeheeha
angry: I can't believe you would be mean to me

name: Muffy
tagline: I'm looking forward to getting to know eachother.
dialogue: Hi! I'm Muffy. Though my looks are enthralling and ginormous, I am really just a regular ant! I used to be petit and microscopic but I've been consuming some miracle-gro on a regular basis, and, well, I grew!

My favorite food used to be fish flakes and nerds clusters, but now that my taste-buds have developed I find them rather.. frivolous. My taste-buds formed around the same time that my vocal chords did - it's true! Had you seen me but a week ago we would be unable to partake in the joys of conversation.

Actually my closest friend and confidant,  Manndy - who is a rat much like yourself, believed me to be a youth before I was able to talk, and was shocked to find that we are the same age! While sharing a meal - my favorite, Miracle-gro: (drought-tolerant) garden soil roses - we were comparing our star charts and found out that they are exactly the same! Functionally, we are twins, Manndy and I, but we have lived such different lives.

I was an architect back in my old anthill, the famous West Montana East-Village Unit E Anthill. It was quite the stressful lifestyle, digging and digging, building and building. But it is also easy as we are so strong. I'm considering writing a book about my time spent with single-segment thorax-free mammals like rats, as I think the ants at home will be fascinated. What is it like not being able to lift 5000 times your weight? You make it look effortless and chic

Just this last week I had the honor of winning the award for biggest ant. It was a blast. Maybe in my top 10 events I have experienced in my many years alive. I won at the Best Ants Annual Award Show. The other competitions at the show where extremely exciting. Next year I'm keen to see who wins Most Aerodynamic, Most Polished Thorax, Hunkiest Ant... dreamiest eyes (I think actually you may have the dreamiest eyes now that I'm looking).

I didn't know love was something someone could find until my best friend found it, and now I have too. You have the dreamiest eyes, the most beguiling maxillary palps, and the most organic phermones. When I look at you my mind expands more than it ever could when I look away. And my heart? why I think it has grow at least three sizes just today.
angry: I feel disrespected, so I wont be staying...

name: Mystique
dialogue: What is never whole, but always broken? Yes, this question has kept me up at night indeedâ€¦ do let me know if you figure it out my dearâ€¦

Past present future, the sands of time slip through the great hourglass, and fall together as one. Drip drip drip goes the faucet of the fountain of youth. and our cells are reborn one by one, yet the veil is never lifted. Have you seen the veil? I canâ€™t find itâ€¦
The ancient prophecy has foretold of a great warrior who could conquer any battleâ€¦ I believe you may be that warrior. But first, answer me this: What is the capital of Idaho?

I saw a mysterious book in an antiques store and I opened it and it asked meâ€¦ â€œIf Rob is going 10 miles per hour, and Melissa is going 12 miles per hour but starts 30 minutes later, when do their fates cross?â€ Iâ€™ve been thinking about this question for yearsâ€¦ do let me know if you have any leadsâ€¦
All of my most challenging riddles and puzzlesâ€¦ youâ€™ve answered them with finesse and easeâ€¦ So wiseâ€¦ the wisest rat Iâ€™ve ever known. Can it beâ€¦ Iâ€™ve finally met the one for meâ€¦? â€¦

Ohâ€¦ Together I believe we have answered the riddle of life and love! My sleepless nights thinking about the worldâ€™s great mysteries are overâ€¦ we shall unlock the secrets of the universe together! My wisest love and my dearest friendâ€¦ !
angry: That was NOT the right answer. In fact, it was so wrong that I think I cannot continue on this show. Goodbye, brave warrior.

name: Oedimb
tagline: Oh! Every day is my birthday!
dialogue: Happy Birthday To Me! :)
Even though every day is My Birthday I want to make sure Your Birthday is extra special too. Please do let me know when your birthday is and we can have a big party!

I took some time off from my job as an insurance adjuster to be here, but Iâ€™ve been missing the office! We hold the best celebrations! When I get that big promotion, weâ€™ll celebrate EVERYONE at the company EVERY day!

How can every day be my birthday? Well, letâ€™s just say that time works differently for me than for others. Being born in a centrifuge rearranged my atoms :) anyway, Iâ€™m really glad that I was born because it means I get to meet you!

I know a guy, If you want it to be your birthday every day, well, I know how to make that happen. Donâ€™t worry, itâ€™s not dangerous - but even if it was, Iâ€™m a really good insurance adjuster. Here, take this kazoo.

Every day of my life is so special, but meeting you has been the most special thing to me. Everything is just so much more exciting and colorful and mesmerizing with you around that I hardly imagine it. My joy is unrivaled, unparalleled, unmatched! UNEQUAL!
angry: That was not aligned with the spirit of celebration : ( This place is not a good party, and I'm going back to my insurance company, where they know how to party right.

name: The Honorable Pamplemouse
dialogue: Helloâ€¦ I am Pamplemouse. As nobility, and also as a rat of astounding honor, I do hold the title of â€œThe Honorableâ€, meaning Iâ€™m actually called â€œThe Honorable Pamplemouseâ€, but I think we are all honorable unless proven otherwise. Please just call me by my first name, or any term of endearment

You never know when danger might strike, and that is why I am an avid collector of horses. If other nobles see that I have many horses, they would not dare conspire against me because they will know that I am the most noble of all... due to the fullness of my stables and the freshness of my hay. I am constantly keeping track of how many horses my cousins have so that I can make sure I have at least one more at all times.

My favorite book is an 1836 copy of â€œLe Grande Extraordinaireâ€, a book and treatise written by my much beloved and atoned great-great-grand-rat, â€˜The Previously Dishonorable but now in Good Graces Von Toutenmouseâ€. I keep it in my inner coat pocket, along with volumes 1 - 33 of the Merriam Webster Dictionary. Volume 33 has been especially helpful to stay in touch with my subjects, as it covers modern slang such as â€œCheetosâ€ and â€œDoritos.â€

I am so small and honorable, but, as a royal, there are threats that I just cannot ignore. For example, the other day our court jester rode in on the most magnificent horse I had ever laid eyes on. I must know, who is their equine provider? Once I find out, I shall buy the finest pair of twin horses for you and I to ride together. Iâ€™m growing quite fond of you, afterall.

You are the most honorable rat that I have ever met, besides myself and my second cousin of course. With the two of us together, our reputation will be so impeccable, and we will be able to do such much good for our subjects together! Letâ€™s get married and invite the whole town â€” Iâ€™ll order 10000 more celebratory horses so that each of our guests may have one as a party favor. Any left unclaimed shall live their gentle lives out in my pastures!
Oh, I cannot wait to spend the rest of my life riding horses with you, my most honorable love!
angry: Alas! I thought you were better than this... my horses won't stand for this!!! I'm leaving this show and am never coming back.

name: Philoxena
tagline: Your eyes remind me of the flower gardens at home, I canâ€™t wait to be friends!
dialogue: Hello, what a pleasure to meet you! I was taught that every new meeting must begin with flowers, so I brought you some pink and yellow tulips to express my feelings.

Iâ€™m s-sorry, I have trouble opening up to new people because I was raised in the tallest tower of a castle on a cliff on an island in the middle of the ocean. I read that the best way to connect to others is to share your greatest fear, soâ€¦ here it goes. My greatest fear is â€œHalloween.â€

Why am I afraid of Halloween? When I first left Chateau Rateau, my ancestral home, I thought October 31st was a regular beautiful day. But when I reached the local town, I couldnâ€™t believe how scary the outside world was! The cobwebs? Gravestones? Skeletons everywhere?! Iâ€™d never left the grounds before, and almost started to cry. Then a small bird flew to me and told me it was all just for 'decoration'.

I decided to leave Chateau Rateau because my cousin showed me a Hot Wheels that they had just gotten, and I realized that the world outside the moat must be full of mysterious trinkets! The Hot Wheels I saw was bright green and vibrant. It reminded me of my familyâ€™s lost emeralds. I asked the worms and they said they donâ€™t know about our emeralds but Hot Wheels are easy to come by!

This is actually my first time in a city, and everything is so new! I didnâ€™t even know that there were life sized versions of Hot Wheels, but there is just something so enchanting about their small scale. I let the city ants drive around in mine, and they were very grateful! They brought me back a lovely nectar lemonade, which is my favorite! Drinks without sugar scare me, but you don't because you are so sweet!

I canâ€™t wait to live the rest of my life with you, Iâ€™m happier than a sunflower in sun and my spirits are rosier than a fresh pink carnation! Iâ€™m so glad that I left my castle, because it led me to you! I love you!
angry: Ah... the flower of our love is wilting... I think it would be best if I returned to my castle for a while.

name: Poodles
dialogue: hEllo! wHat can I do for you today? iâ€™M Poodles, and my favorite thing in the world is to grant wishes and help others!
a Lot of rats donâ€™t believe that I have rEAL wish-granting powers. wEll, they havenâ€™t seen me after three diet pepsis and one glass of milk!

iâ€™Ve been in a few relationships, and those were the best times of my life! i Just LOVE engaging in acts of service! wHen those relationships ended, boy, it broke my heart every time! tHeyâ€™d just say â€œPoodles, somehow my life changed for the better AND for the worse after meeting you! Just let ME solve my own problems for once!â€

I was SO excited to meet you again that I spent all of last night cleaning my neighbors yard and then messing it up again and then cleaning it again but even better! tHen I took a quick break to do my sisterâ€™s taxes and then I bounced all the way here! Oh NO, do u think I filled out box 34A incorrectly????!!?!?!?!?!

dO you like waking up to freshly pressed bed sheets every day, changed gently during your sleep? aNd your favourite breakfast foods on your lap on a platter? aNd your mail already sorted and your taxes filed? aNd maybe a warm towel to start the day? Iâ€™d lOve to be your rat, Iâ€™d do anything for you!

yoU chose me!!! Oh, Iâ€™m SO excited! Oh, I have 11 different possible dates planned and pre-booked â€” and here are some flowers â€” no pressure we donâ€™t have to do all of them â€” and also 12 wedding binders with themes and options. I love you! I love you! So much!
angry: oh no... that was so mean! I think I need to leave...

name: Swalorn
tagline: Whatâ€™s cookinâ€™ good lookinâ€™ vroooom vroooom
dialogue: Hey, ever ridden on a motorcycle before? Iâ€™d love to take ya for a spin, and if youâ€™re not afraid I can show you how to do an Ollie. When I fuel up I always seek out the most expensive gas station in town because that means their gas is better.

My ride has a custom license plate that says â€œB TRUEâ€. Itâ€™s a reminder to always B TRUE to myself and others. I only deal in luxury tandem-cycles, and anything low-end is a waste of my time, but itâ€™s nice to know thereâ€™s always room for a friend.. Or a partner â€¦. In love?

Itâ€™s bite or be bit out there. I run an underground bowling league so Iâ€™m always prepared to run at any moment if the feds find out. My teeth are brushed and Iâ€™m always up to date on my vaccinations and I change my bikeâ€™s oil every week just in case. I also keep at least $100 on me at all times.

A new person joined my underground bowling league the other day and they said they were friends with Jagadoo but I just called Jagadoo and they didnâ€™t know who I was talking about. Iâ€™m wondering if the feds are onto us??? I really need to get to the store and switch out the bowling balls but honestly right now youâ€™re my number one priority.

I went to my friendâ€™s shop this morning and got you these keys for the Rambo 3000 MIX Dragon Fire all-wheel frontal axis gold plated Hammercycle Â© Motorcycle. They havenâ€™t even gone on the public market but I wanted you to be able to take it for a test ride; Iâ€™ll take the back seat - how does a drive on the riverside sound?

Wow. You are so good at picking a rat to spend the rest of your life with. Letâ€™s run away. Letâ€™s elope. Letâ€™s break the world record for most in love tandem motorcyclists. Whoops! We already did ;)
angry: ugh! cars wouldn't talk to me like this. I have more important things to do than stay on this show and date someone rude like you. See ya never!

name: Tambone
tagline: You and me, could it be?
dialogue: So I took my car to the mechanic and they said I needed an oil change, which got me thinking that maybe perhaps I am in more need of change in my life than I realized

Last week I turned the lights off and I was stunned by the darkness, so I wrote a poem titled â€œDimly is the Moonlit Eveâ€ â€¦ it ends â€œthough the dawn is drawing near, moonlight knows what happened hereâ€
Why do I write poetry? Hah! I might as well ask, why does the wind blow? Why does the moon control the tides, and why does a microwave pop my popcorn? Itâ€™s simply nature

On my walk today a gentle butterfly landed on a delicate flower. Its wings fluttered so gently and as it landed, two new beings touched for the first time and became one. It got me thinking about how I just met you but I already feel so connected to you. How is that possible?
I only have one Rattoo, itâ€™s of an inchworm. I feel similar to an inchworm in many ways, though I never knew what I was inching towards. Now I know Iâ€™ve been inching towards you!

Your soul and my soul are threads in the fabric of a treasured garment, a favorite t-shirt from a memorable concert where a young love was formed. Iâ€™ve never met anyone like you before. You are home to me my dear, and I love you.
angry:
Betrayal cuts deep,
The pain is like a knife,
I feel so alone.
Goodbye, traitor.
I am leaving this show.

name: Thundercroft
dialogue: Oh! Hello, I didnâ€™t see you there. I was distracted by the weather! Those are cumulus clouds, some of my favorites! How about you?

Iâ€™m so glad we got to have a second date! I have to take a quick trip out to Ratvaria this evening. Theyâ€™re havingâ€¦ some weather related problems I need to solveâ€¦ we can talk about that later - how are doing today? Not too sunny I hope? And no above average windchill? Just let me know

Iâ€™m glad we get along so well. People usually take a while to warm up to me. I have snake relatives on my motherâ€™s motherâ€™s aunt side, so Iâ€™m sometimes cold-blooded, but only literally! Not emotionally. But I can be shy, and I think sometimes people get the wrong impression, or they think my name is too scary.

When I was a kid I used to make the sky storm by accident. It would happen when I saw things that made me mad, like when I saw schoolyard Bob stealing lollipops from the other kids, or when I saw the effects of employers underpaying their workers. I want to leave the world a better place every day through small actions and sometimes I think about manipulating traffic lights a little bit just to optimize the flow but a small voice inside me says that would be wrong so I donâ€™t

One time I bought some cotton candy, but I dropped it on the floor and started crying. When I started crying, it started raining and that made my cotton candy disappear and I started crying even more, and then the rain came down even harder, so then I was all wet and It made me even more sad. Which.. Well, lets just say that was the biggest flood my parents ever saw in Ratvada. It was good though â€˜cause we were in the middle of a drought. That was the first time I started to really understand the power that individuals have to make the world a better place

Yesterday when I woke up for the sunrise - the perfect amount of mist was in the air so when the sun finally peaked over the hills, you could see all the colors and rays of light andâ€¦ and I felt so warm and comfortable and inspired and I realized thatâ€™s also how I feel when Iâ€™m around you. I love you.
angry: Calm skies... sunny skies.... that's what I have to tell myself when I'm about to cry. I don't think it is healthy for me to stay with someone so mean, so I'm going to leave the show. Thanks for the good times.

name: Yodine
dialogue: I was so nervous to be a contestant that I went out and ended up buying myself my very own diamond ring. I thought this way I wouldnâ€™t be as nervous about whether or not we get married, and I felt like it would take a lot of the pressure off, helping me feel more relaxed and authentic, instead of feeling like Iâ€™m in a competition with everyone.

I try to stay grounded but I think that sometimes other peopleâ€™s expectations of me cloud my judgement and confuse my inner compass. Thatâ€™s the last thing I want. I want to be able to know more about myself, and my thoughts and feelings - without other peopleâ€™s getting in the way. That being said, I am grateful for my friends and my family and have a lot of love for the people in my life

When I was a kid my older sister brought me to the tree-climbing competition to watch my younger brother climb a tree as fast as he could. It was a surprise because I didn't know tree-climbing competitions existed, and I didn't know my brother climbed. When he won, he gave a short speech and thanked me and my sister for inspiring him to do what he loved - turns out she didn't know about the competition either. Afterwards we all went for cake to celebrate, and it was nice to realize not only how much I loved my siblings, but how much we loved each other.

I love my family and my friends, but I also appreciate time alone. I think it helps me to ground myself and interact with the world in a less distracted, more intentional way. When I take walks alone I find myself awed by the flowers and buildings and sounds of the world in a way that I forget to when Iâ€™m with others. When I take a walk with a friend, I find myself more focused on the conversations we are having, and the thoughts in my mind. I think both are valuable and the experiences balance eachother out. The calm serenity of observing fills me with a deep fulfillment and tranquility.

You know, Iâ€™ve grown quite fond of my ring. I think I wouldnâ€™t mind wearing two of them! In fact I think I would actually quite prefer it! Iâ€™d even like to get you one.. If you would like? Then we would match :)  I think you are very kind and I wouldnâ€™t mind spending the rest of my life with you - actually I think I might like that more than anything.

Iâ€™m so glad we found eachother. I think we are quite a pair. Iâ€™ve really loved getting to know you. I was really nervous about being here but your presence really calmed me, and I think we complement one another very well.
angry: I'm very upset by your words but at least i have my ring.. Honestly, I think this ring is all I ever needed. I'm going to leave this show.

name: Zindello
dialogue: Itâ€™s a joy to look into your eyes, where I can see the twinkling sparkle of words that havenâ€™t been said. I canâ€™t wait to hear you say them!

Sometimes I draw a Tarat card in the morning to give me inspiration for the day, and this morning my card was all about creating new relationships. It made me think about you, and how excited I am to get to know you better.

I printed the stars from the skies from our birthdays and re-organized them so that the different constellations spelled out how much I love you -- 100,023! That was no accident, no serendipitous twist of fate, but the fruits of my labors.

What if we took a boat ride right now! That would be so romantic. I know itâ€™s -10 degrees outside but I have 12 entire rain ponchos and some extra blankets so we will stay so warm. I think If we go all the way into the middle of the lake we would have such a lovely view of the moon, and then when the moon leaves we will be able to see the sun.

When I was walking home today I ran into a lizard who wouldnâ€™t stop telling me the answers to different riddles, but wouldnâ€™t provide the questions. Suddenly they said your name. I knew then and there the only question could have been: â€œWho is the rat nearest and dearest to your heart?â€

My love, you are my past, my present, and my future! We are truly partners, and I am so delighted that you and I can explore all the wonders of this brilliant world together. Letâ€™s go gaze at the stars and hold hands!
angry: This is a sign we were not meant to be. I hate to close doors, but I think this one must close. Goodbye, friend. Hope to see you around.
